item.description: Nour Echa√¢ra Age : 19 years old Living in Brussels Passionate about IT What am I looking for ? All jobs related to sales in the IT domain are also welcomed Languages spoken French (mothertong) English (Fluently spoken) Education 2014 - 2019 : Institut Saint Dominique (English and Economic Sciences) 2019 - 2021 : Institut Don Bosc Val d’Or (IT) 2021 - .
